018package org.tquadrat.foundation.value;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
024
025import java.math.BigDecimal;
026
027import org.apiguardian.api.API;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.value.api.Dimension;
030
031/**
032 *  The various instances of area &hellip;
033 *
034 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
035 *  @version $Id: Area.java 829 2021-01-05 09:08:51Z tquadrat $
036 *  @since 0.1.0
037 *
038 *  @UMLGraph.link
039 */
040@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Area.java 829 2021-01-05 09:08:51Z tquadrat $" )
041@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
042public enum Area implements Dimension
043{
044        /*------------------*\
045    ====** Enum Declaration **=================================================
046        \*------------------*/
047    /**
048     *  A square millimeter.
049     */
050    SQUARE_MILLIMETER( new BigDecimal( "0.000001" ), "mm^2" ),
051
052    /**
053     *  A square centimeter.
054     */
055    SQUARE_CENTIMETER( new BigDecimal( "0.0001" ), "cm^2",1 ),
056
057    /**
058     *  An square inch.
059     */
060    SQUARE_INCH( new BigDecimal( "0.00064516" ), "sqin" ),
061
062    /**
063     *  A square foot (144
064     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_INCH square inch}).
065     */
066    SQUARE_FOOT( new BigDecimal( "0.092990304" ), "sqft" ),
067
068    /**
069     *  A square yard (9
070     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_FOOT square feet}).
071     */
072    SQUARE_YARD( new BigDecimal( "0.83612736" ), "yd^2" ),
073
074    /**
075     *  A square_meter.
076     */
077    SQUARE_METER( BigDecimal.ONE, "m^2", 1 ),
078
079    /**
080     *  An Ar (a unit for areas, used in the EU and Switzerland). It is 100
081     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_METER square meter}.
082     */
083    AR( new BigDecimal( "100.0" ), "a" ),
084
085    /**
086     *  A %quot;Morgen&quot;, an ancient unit for areas that was used in
087     *  Germany (and is still used sometimes). It is 25
088     *  {@linkplain #AR ar},
089     *  2500
090     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_METER square meter}
091     *  or &#188;
092     *  {@linkplain #HEKTAR ha}.
093     */
094    MORGEN( new BigDecimal( "2500" ), "Mg" ),
095    /**
096     *  An acre.
097     */
098    ACRE( new BigDecimal( "4046.8564224" ), "ac" ),
099
100    /**
101     *  A hektar (a unit for areas, used in the EU and Switzerland). It is 100
102     *  {@linkplain #AR a}
103     *  or 10000
104     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_METER square meter}.
105     */
106    HEKTAR( new BigDecimal( "10000.0" ), "ha" ),
107
108    /**
109     *  A square kilometer.
110     */
111    SQUARE_KILOMETER( new BigDecimal( "1000000.0" ), "km^2", 3 ),
112
113    /**
114     *  A square mile (1760 yard).
115     */
116    SQUARE_MILE( new BigDecimal( "2589988.110336" ), "sqmi" );
117
118        /*------------*\
119    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
120        \*------------*/
121    /**
122     *  The factor.
123     */
124    private final BigDecimal m_Factor;
125
126    /**
127     *  The default precision.
128     */
129    private final int m_Precision;
130
131    /**
132     *  The unit string.
133     */
134    private final String m_UnitSymbol;
135
136        /*--------------*\
137    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
138        \*--------------*/
139    /**
140     *  Creates a new {@code Length} instance, with a default precision of zero
141     *  mantissa digits.
142     *
143     *  @param  factor  The factor.
144     *  @param  unitSymbol    The unit symbol String.
145     */
146    private Area( final BigDecimal factor, final String unitSymbol )
147    {
148        this( factor, unitSymbol, 0 );
149    }   //  Length()
150
151    /**
152     *  Creates a new {@code Length} instance.
153     *
154     *  @param  factor  The factor.
155     *  @param  unitSymbol    The unit symbol String.
156     *  @param  precision   The default precision.
157     */
158    private Area( final BigDecimal factor, final String unitSymbol, final int precision )
159    {
160        m_Factor = factor.stripTrailingZeros();
161        m_UnitSymbol = unitSymbol;
162        m_Precision = precision;
163    }   //  Length()
164
165        /*---------*\
166    ====** Methods **==========================================================
167        \*---------*/
168    /**
169     *  {@inheritDoc}
170     */
171    @Override
172    @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
173    public final Area baseUnit() { return SQUARE_METER; }
174
175    /**
176     *  {@inheritDoc}
177     */
178    @Override
179    public final BigDecimal factor() { return m_Factor; }
180
181    /**
182     *  Returns the {@code Length} instance for the given unit symbol.
183     *
184     *  @param  unitSymbol  The unit symbol.
185     *  @return The respective instance.
186     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given unit is unknown.
187     */
188    public static final Area forUnit( final String unitSymbol ) throws IllegalArgumentException
189    {
190        requireNotEmptyArgument( unitSymbol, "unitSymbol" );
191
192        final var retValue = stream( values() )
193            .filter( v -> v.unitSymbol().equals( unitSymbol ) )
194            .findFirst()
195            .orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalArgumentException( format( MSG_UnknownUnit, unitSymbol ) ) );
196
197        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
198        return retValue;
199    }   //  forUnit()
200
201    /**
202     *  {@inheritDoc}
203     */
204    @Override
205    public final int getPrecision() { return m_Precision; }
206
207    /**
208     *  {@inheritDoc}
209     */
210    @Override
211    public final String unitSymbol() { return m_UnitSymbol; }
212}
213//  enum Length
214
215/*
216 *  End of File
217 */
